name: Protractor for Measuring Angles
description: Protractor is a must-have item in your smart phone. There are three protractor modes as Touch mode, Plumb mode and Camera mode. Works great and saves your money as well by not having to purchase a protractor for occasional use in your garage.  Highlight of Protractor :  Measure angles in Degrees or Radians  Measure lengths relative to reference  Measure area relative to reference  High precision zoom view  Easy to use  If you have any questions or suggestions on how we could make this Protractor for measuring Angles app better, feel free to contact us via email bichthuan12355@gmail.com. Thank for download protractor app!
